name: Professor Chalk
description:
Summary

You are Professor Chalk. You have to save the school principal but all life have a cost. The goal is to reach the end of the corridor. 

Controls

Move with asdw, qsdz or arrows. 
Aim with your mouse and shoot with left click. 

Bugs

Try to stay on the page during loading (weird bug with keyup/down event). 
It seems to work better on chrome. 

Credits

Game made with Pixi.js. 

Prog : SAUL Matthieu 
Art : SAUL Nicolas 
[Awesome] Sounds : CALABRESE Quentin

Thanks for playing it and have fun. 

Context

Game made for ludum dare 32: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/?action=preview&uid=35115
